document_data.name: Dolrur Jathlet
document_data.refs3e: {{Cite web/Elminster Speaks archive|44-45}}{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks/Part 37: The Satraps of Delzimmer, Part 2}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Dolrur Jathlet''' was a young scion of the [[Jathlet]] merchant family in [[Delzimmer]] ''circa'' the [[1373 DR|Year of Rogue Dragons, 1373 DR]]. He was one of a dozen young men, all brothers or first cousins, that made up the next generation of the prolific Jathlet family. They all pursued interests in business (legitimate or otherwise, some very risky) that would increase their standing within the family. When in their hometown of Delzimmer, they strutted about as if they owned the place, which was true to some extent.
